title: Pope 'preparing' for first contact with aliens this year, says UFO researcher
description: British filmmaker says he has been given 'rare access' to the Vatican's secret archives and that the Church is getting ready for ET

title: ‘Mysterious’ glowing spiral appears in sky – near where possible UFO was spotted in 2024
description: A man in Cornwall was left shocked after he spotted what seemed to look like a UFO while driving back home on Christmas Day, with a similar incident in 2024

title: "Instead of being 80% UFO and 20% on foot, we flipped it": How Destroy All Humans' sci-fi action oddity conquered all
description: Interview | Pandemic Studio alums go deep into the making of the kooky adventure that rocked PS2 and Xbox

title: Donald Trump 'could unveil bombshell UFO photos soon' says USAF nuclear specialist
description: EXCLUSIVE: Gene Sticco, a national security expert and ex-Air Force nuclear protection specialist, has theorised that the public may, at the very least, receive enough to "satisfy the collective itch" as soon as this year

title: USAF nuclear specialist claims Donald Trump 'could release bombshell UFO pictures soon'
description: EXCLUSIVE: Gene Sticco, a national security expert and ex-Air Force nuclear protection specialist, suggested that the public may, at the very least, be given enough to "satisfy the collective itch"
